titles.title: Let The Glory Of The Lord (The Glory of the Lord)

properties.copyright: 1996 Nori & Barbie Kelley, Administered by Count the Cost Publishing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
*sisters echo*
Let the glory of the Lord endure forever
Let the Lord be glad in His works
I will sing to the Lord
As long as I live
I will sing praise to my God
While I have my being
